title: Fiery cream of chicken soup
ingredients: ['15g butter', '80g diced onion', '1 teaspoon finely chopped garlic', '80g chopped fresh green chillies', '100g cooked chicken, cut into chunks', '1 1/2 teaspoons ground cumin', '1 (295g) tin condensed cream of chicken soup', '300ml single cream', '120g grated Cheddar cheese', '4 tablespoons soured cream']
